title: Council Regulation (EC) No 1251/95 of 29 May 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3283/94 on protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Community
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1251/95 of 29 May 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3283/94 on  protection against dumped imports from countries not members of the European Community
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The third sentence of Article 24 of Regulation (EC) No 3283/94  shall be replaced by the following:
'The time limits prescribed by Articles 5 (9), 6 (9) and 7 (1) shall apply in respect of complaints  lodged pursuant to Article 5 (9) on or after 1 September 1995 and investigations initiated pursuant  to such complaints.`
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1995.
For the Council The President Ph. VASSEUR
